item.title: After Event Social: Bartending Basics
item.description:
Description

"After Event Social: Bartending Basics" by: Tito Sierra

Learn the basics of bartending at home. Topics include a review of bar tools, glassware, liquor, mixing ingredients, and drink preparation. No slides… learn how to mix proper cocktails through live demonstration in the presenter’s kitchen.

Bartending Basics Guide at: https://2021.pythonwebconf.com/images/bartending-basics-python-web-conf-2021-1.pdf
item.dc:creator: Tito Sierra
